name: Wild Magic (bbrook28)
description:
Wild Magic  is a fantasy bullet-hell style game where Wizzo the Wizard must face deadly enemies while learning to use his magical powers. Be careful! His out of control magic can inhibit his movement, so careful timing and consideration are a must in order to survive. 

Wield powerful spells:  Wizzo can wield dangerous combat magic against his foes. Each enemy type is vulnerable to a different type of spell, so use them wisely.

Size matters:  High velocity spells can send Wizzo careening through the environment. Be aware of hazards in your path when using spells that cause a lot of kickback.

Survive:  It'll take a combination of strategy, timing, and a little luck to overcome the obstacles in your way.
